ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Colinus virginianus (bobwhite quail) oral 2511 ppm in 5 day diet (95% confidence limit 2160-2908 ppm) /purity, 98%/
LC50 Japanese quail oral greater than 5000 ppm in 5 day diet (20% mortality at 5000 ppm) /purity, 98%/
LC50 Phasianus colchicus, (ring-necked pheasants) oral 1540 ppm in 5 day diet (95% confidence limit 1320-1789 ppm) /purity, 98%/
LC50 Anas platyrhynchos, (mallard ducks) oral greater than 5000 ppm in 5 day diet (no mortality to 5000 ppm) /purity 98%/
LD50 Anas platyrhynchos, (mallard ducks) oral greater than 2400 mg/kg, 3 mo old males /purity 98%/
LD50 Phasianus, (pheasants) oral greater than 2000 mg/kg, 3 mo old females /purity 98%/
EC50 Daphnid Simocephalus serrulatus, >0.100 mg/L/48 hr at 16 °C, 1st instar; Effect: intoxication, immobilization /technical material, 98%; static bioassay without aeration/
EC50 Daphnia pulex (daphnid), >0.100 mg/L/48 hr at 16 °C, 1st instar; Effect: intoxication, immobilization /technical material, 98%; static of bioassay without aeration/
EC50 Daphnia magna (daphnid), >1.0 mg/L/48 hr at 17 °C, 1st instar; Effect: intoxication, immobilization /technical material, 98%; static bioassay without aeration/
EC50 Chironomus plumosus (midge), greater than 1.0 mg/l/48 hr at 22 °C, 4th instar /technical material, 98%; static of bioassay without aeration/
LC50 Gammarus pseudolimnaeus (scud), greater than 1.0 mg/l/96 hr at 17 °C, mature /technical material, 98%; static of bioassay without aeration/
LC50 Salmo gairdnerii (rainbow trout), greater than 100 mg/l/96 hr at 12 °C, wt 1 g /technical material, 98%; static of bioassay without aeration/
LC50 Perca flavescens (yellow perch), greater than 100 mg/l/96 hr at 15 °C, wt 2.6 g /technical material, 98%; static of bioassay without aeration/
LC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow), greater than 100 mg/l/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.3 g /wettable powder, 50%; static bioassay without aeration/
LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill sunfish), greater than 100 mg/l/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.1 g /wettable powder, 50%; static of bioassay without aeration/
LC50 Stizostedion vitreum (walleye), greater than 100 mg/l/96 hr at 18 °C, wt 1.4 g /wettable powder, 50%; static of bioassay without aeration/
LD50 Shrimp 1.01 ppm/72 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
LC50 Callinectes sapidus (blue crab) 56 mg/L/96 hr, static
LD50 Peromyscus maniculatus (Deer mouse) oral 1600 mg/kg
